name: VideoCells
tag_list: vsaas, video-surveillance-as-a-service, dvr, nvr, video-surveillance, security, video, cctv, ip-cameras, cameras, network-cameras, security-integrators
overview:
VideoCells Ltd., established in 2006, is a leading provider of web-based video surveillance solutions for security monitoring companies, telecommunications operators, and ISPs. The company’s patented technology enables broadcasting of real-time and recorded video streams from IP, analog, and web cameras to PCs, mobile phones, and PDAs. With VideoCells’ technology, surveillance videos are recorded and viewable 24/7 over the Internet, thereby replacing the non-scalable and costly DVR solution.

WebVRÂ® (Web Video Recorder), VideoCells’ carrier-grade video surveillance platform, delivers advanced video viewing, recording, storage, retrieval, and maintenance capabilities, facilitating the up-sell of existing clientele and generating stable monthly revenue streams. Extending value-added services (VAS), WebVR enables service providers to reach the mass market in residential and small office/home office (SoHo) target markets, offering a low-cost video surveillance solution, and benefitting end users with a service that can be accessed anytime, anywhere.

VideoCells is lead by industry veterans with an expertise in video surveillance and software development. The driving force behind the company’s high-standard technology is the Research & Development team, who are former software developers from elite technology and intelligence units in the Israeli army, and experts in video technology.
